title: What happens if Apple buys Netflix? - Quora

response.answer_text: Basically, it's hard to predict what will happen if Apple buys Netflix. Like, for example If Apple buys Netflix and made it bit expensive than before, it would be a loss coz then people would start switching to Amazon Prime , etc. Secondly, if apple buys Netflix and made it limited only to their products still its a loss. But, if everything goes well, and apple somehow maneges to lower the price of a TV series on Netflix, and like provides free months trial for iphone , ipad or other apple products , it would be a huge profit as now a days IOS it competing with androids, and people will start buying apple products coz mostly phones are now-a-days are used for watching series on the go! And, if made certain or many seires a lot cheaper for apple products, its also a huge profit!
Maybe NETFLIX would change its policy to $1 per episode or something more expensive or maybe something less expensive, cant say! Lets hope it wouldn't!
